title: Organizational Learning Capacity Building for Sustainability

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental organizational management knowledge and leadership experience
context.additional_context: Customized learning environments using VR simulations in smartphone-centric limited technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain the association between Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) and organizational learning capabilities.
Learners can derive sustainability improvement strategies by analyzing organizational diagnostic data using structural equation modeling.
Learners can establish an action plan to strengthen organizational learning capabilities (OLC) by designing Mindful Organization (MO) operational strategies.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
